casebody.data:
William PETAWAY
v.
COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided January 25, 2017

Temmy Ann Miller, in support of the petition.

Stephen R. Finucane, assistant attorney general, in opposition.

The petitioner William Petaway's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 160 Conn.App. 727, 125 A.3d 1053 (2015), is dismissed.
